# mx-tab-content

## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                           | Type     | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ----------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `index`  | `index`   | The index of the tab that corresponds to this content | `number` | `undefined` |
| `value`  | `value`   | The index of the selected tab                         | `number` | `undefined` |
